title: Track Customer Shipment
description: A customer is calling to get a status update on their recent order shipment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's order using their name or order number.
Get the tracking number associated with the order's shipment.
Use the tracking number to get the latest shipment status from the carrier's API.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the current status, e.g., 'Out for Delivery'.

tasks.description: Communicate the current shipment status and estimated delivery date to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly provides the tracking information to the customer.
